contest-event.event-date:
June 10, 1949 D Bottom Mossley (Whit Friday)
Bottom Mossley (Whit Friday) 0 March Contest Whit Friday Tameside bottom-mossley-whit-friday
Contest ran 1884-1955.
Mossley Result as shown in Alec Greenhalgh book 'Hail Smiling Morn', however Brass Band News July 1949 shows 1st Carlton Main, 2nd Edge Hill, 3rd C.W.S., 4th Brighouse.
Feb. 15, 2017, 11:48 a.m. March 22, 2021, 8:05 a.m.
1 Markham Main Colliery Band Unknown
2 Edge Hill Unknown
3 City of Manchester Unknown
